description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Luke Westby - JavaScript developer and Partner at HumbleSpark

ABSTRACT
In this talk, Luke will demonstrate all of the beauties of Elm, its syntax, tools, community, and hopefully convince you that the Elm is exactly what front-end developers have been looking for. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7709

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: GOTO 2016 • Elm-Friendly Functional Programming For The Web • Luke Westby
